cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on July 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7188, Modernizing Department of Veterans Affairs Disability Benefit Questionnaires Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 50 (Monday, March 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NEHLS:
H.R. 7188.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 1 of U.S. Constitution
By Mr. NEWHOUSE
H.R. 7189.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 4 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H3859]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
